concept.title: Symptoms of Platen Failure
concept.shortdesc: The condition of your platen roller contains indicators that may suggest a malfunction.

conbody.p: There are a few common indicators that suggest a malfunction in the platen of a typewriter.

ul.li: The platen begins to lose its grip, causing uneven paper feeding.
The typing impression weakens due to reduced friction between the paper and roller surface.
Dirty or hardened platen rollers limit the typewriter's performance and make the paper slip during typing.

conbody.note: These conditions indicate that the platen may need cleaning, repair, or replacement.
